checksum.description: the checksum of the DMN resource (MD5)

decisionRequirementsId.description: the ID of the DRG in the DMN

decisionRequirementsKey.description: the key of the deployed DRG

decisionRequirementsName.description: the name of the DRG in the DMN

decisionRequirementsVersion.description: the version of the deployed DRG

namespace.description: the namespace of the DRG in the DMN

resourceName.description: the name of the resource through which this DRG was deployed
